author: {'steamid': '76561198034345551', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1653461506}
review: Game de plataforma bem clássico, daqueles de pegar X itens para liberar acesso ao final da fase, os gráficos são bons e tem vários efeitos legais por causa do lance do fogo do personagem. Tem bastante variedade de mecânicas, mas nada complicado de entender e resolver. A dificuldade é mediana, tem fases muito fáceis e seguidas de outras difíceis, não é gradual, é misturado mesmo. Tem 3 chefes, mas são fáceis pois quando a gente morre eles voltam com o mesmo nível de vida. Os fases tem daqueles rankings de estrelas e pontuação, mas não libera nem itens nem troféus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050750548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 598, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1597988029}

author: {'steamid': '76561198134509614', 'num_games_owned': 1796, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 924, 'last_played': 1540588309}
review:
Launched on [url=https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0518-CUSA01747_00-PIXELCANDLELIGHT] PS4 [/url]  as  well as Steam this solo effort, by Rod Moye/ Pixel Maverick Games was 3 years in the making.  The result is a solid casual 2D platformer that’s charm kept me playing all 15 levels, collecting every idol and some speed runs. 

 An evil being extinguishes all the candles in the land. It’s  the job of our lone candle to bring light back to the land. Despite this not offering anything new there is some reasons that elevated this from meh to recommend:

The artwork in this game is very appealing. It has a cute aesthetics even with the enemies. The use of colour is applied well with good shading and light. It is more muted tones than bright colours but it suits the storyline. 

Its charming, cute and fun to play. I was unsure of my intentions when I started this but I ended getting sucked in and enjoying my time with it.

There is a nice balance in levels and difficulty progression. You are steadily introduced to all the game mechanics and enemies before having to use them all in later levels. The levels themselves also vary in length. Within each level there is a good balance between easier and more hard sections.

My only personal complaints are I would like to have seen more of other level designs. I really liked the playing card and pirate levels and would have liked to seen them used more.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1549492463

 I experienced no technical issues with this game. It was smooth and responsive with the Xbox one controller.

This is an excellent example of a simple casual 2D platformer done very well. Clearly a lot of effort went into this. It’s definitely worth a casual play for a few hours, in between a bigger game rotation or if you are just looking for something relaxing and comfortable to play.

I believe I brought this in a bundle a while ago so if you have it in your library and its something you would play check it out!

author: {'steamid': '76561197994666064', 'num_games_owned': 3746, 'num_reviews': 611, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1524500372}
review:
Um jogo meio indeciso...

A primeira fase desse jogo é tão suave que parece ser pra criança com menos de 10 anos, no entanto na segunda a dificuldade sobe demais e na terceira mais ainda. A sensação é que é um jogo meio indeciso sobre o público que quer atingir. É bacana, tem um design bonito pra caramba apesar da simplicidade das texturas e modelos 3D, não é algo genérico. Pode ser um jogo divertido para os fãs de plataforma, não é tão minha praia, então não me apaixonei, mas dá pra ver o esforço da equipe em colocar coisas diferentes, como ter que correr para um abrigo quando chover ou ficar coletando cera pra não morrer (já que você é uma vela). Enfim, acho que fãs de plataforma podem adorar, mas precisam jogar mais que a primeira fase, pois ela pode ser tediosa de tão fácil. Análise detalhada aqui:

http://www.nerdmaldito.com/2018/04/candlelight-jogo-de-plataforma-fofinho.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198114483688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1512318613}

author: {'steamid': '76561198006563527', 'num_games_owned': 3471, 'num_reviews': 909, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1473124102}
review:
Candlelight ist ein Jump'n Run mit einer zweckmäßigen aber immerhin schon mal nicht-Pixel-Grafik, dafür bin ich schon dankbar. Handwerklich ist das Spiel gut gemacht, wenn auch auf Dauer etwas langweilig weil es irgendwie dann schon an Gegner fehlt, es ist ein reines (soweit ich das beurteilen kann) Geschicklichkeits-Jump'n Run. Die Story ist reichlich bekloppt, aber nun gut, Mario hatte auch nicht gerade ein Hollywood-Skript. Das Spiel ist ingesamt gesehen wirklich nett aber nur für Fans von "friedlichen" Jump*n Runs geeignet.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5PasQra0WiQ

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1472664753}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Платформер в котором мы играем за... Свечку! Да... свечку путешествующую по островам, собирающую воск и врагами нашими будет ветер, огонь и вода (все что может навредить нашему фитилю и воску). На каждом уровне есть три храма природных элементов. Вот и все, чем может похвастаться игра.

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
¥ Удобное управление.

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
¥ Нет достижений.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Странное чувство. Вроде типичный платформер. Необычные персонажи, но все остальное как всегда. А вроде и придраться не к чему. Все проходится, не очень скучно, уровни построены с душой. Были бы достижения был бы смысл собирать все на уровне... Долго ломался рекомендовать или нет и результат перед вами.

[h1]Оценка: 5/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198309848279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1580610389}
review: Having Candlelight on the PS4 and loving it, the first game I got when I joined Steam was Candlelight. This game is very entertaining. If I had to describe it to something I've played before I would have to say a modern day Pitfall with a candle. The graphics are well put together. Some graphics are blocky like minecraft while other graphics are wispery like the clouds. The lighting is fantastic blend to the game. I can see great effort was put into the graphics unlike most dev games you see. The play is fun, I had a great time playing the game. I then turned it up a notch and played through going as fast as I could with out dying in the level/(next land). By doing this this made the game totally different an easy level became not so easy. I also could then understand how the developer created the level and how the level flowed which gave me even more respect for the game. The game has many lands and themes to the land. I really enjoyed the Raiders of the Lost Ark theme and Alice and Wonderland theme blew me away. I definately thought I got my money's worth, I payed full price on both platforms, ps4 and steam. I highly recommend this game, and if you do buy it then for each land go for the score that matters, 9900+ means you went balls fast and didn't die! get it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198197185128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1471823627}
review: This Game is an outstanding game. The graphics are quite nice and the music is at a good volume. Its creative plot is well thought out and consistent.  Candlelight is a really fun game with a cute candle as a main character.  This indie platform title keeps you challenged but is not overly frustrating.  The controls are picked up easily and aren't overly complicated.  Some levels are very interesting and really stick out over the rest, such as the "Indiana Jones" and "Alice" inspired levels.  10/10 would play again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198199485414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1482093440}
review: Candlelight really impressed me with its unique gameplay and graphics.  Story was told through the gameplay which is a nice departure from most games.  Even though it is a simple game to play the level difficulty ramped up near the end. Also the end was kinda sad but makes me want to see if the candle will return.  10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198211415941', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1458067903}
review: Played this game through and through a few times with my son. REALLY cool lighting effects and intuitive gameplay. Love the dark and gloomy atmosphere, but charged by hope of lighting the world. Fun game. Recommended for all you other PC gamers!

author: {'steamid': '76561197985969658', 'num_games_owned': 1012, 'num_reviews': 690, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1471294667}
review:
Its a fairly standard platformer, but rather mediocre and uninteresting. You are a candle that slowly burns out every level. You collect wax to stay alive, but if you die you just restart at a checkpoint, so thankfully it's not too annoying. The levels are poorly laid out, and you have to collect a map to see the level outlay, although it just shows points and no routes, so it's easy to get lost or have trouble finding where you want to go. Also the ending part of the level is not laid out on the map. Every level is the same, there's some wind, dynamite, candles to light for extra areas, and 3 little roosm to go in to light the 3 candles. You then go to the end and that's it. There's 3 boox fights which are rather uninteresting. The platforming mechanics work, but there's just not much fun to be had. Its repetitive, with nothing new it brings to the table. The level design and map system are bad. It's not terrible, just uninspired. 

6/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044433501', 'num_games_owned': 1053, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1468518188}
review: Jetzt haben wir endlich auch einen miesen Kerzen anzünd Simulator! Nein ernsthaft. Es gibt da draussen viele gute Jump&Runs, nur ist Candlelight repetitiv bis zum geht nicht mehr. Da sind nicht mal Gegner ausser manchmal ein Windhauch. Man springt nur herum bis man 3 Fackeln findet, die das Tor am Ende des Levels öffnen. Sonst passiert so ziemlich 0. Man kann auch Kerzen anzünden, aber das scheint nur ne unnötige Highscoresache zu sein.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970602587', 'num_games_owned': 6364, 'num_reviews': 3660, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1468296065}
review:
https://youtu.be/lBg4MN6diyI

Evil forces of literal darkness are snuffing out all the cute little candles across the land, except for one lucky little wick that managed to avoid the shadowy fate.

Despite some cute characters and responsive controls this basic platformer has some major pacing issues that cripple this otherwise snappy game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998673004', 'num_games_owned': 481, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1465788841}
review:
Don't play this game.

Rather, don't play Candlelight if you expect a game meant for anyone above the age of 10. Overall it's a cute romp, but it's a fairly introductory platformer with no depth or skill. The graphics are cute and stylized, perfect for someone on the younger side of the gamer spectrum, but still fairly unpolished.

The price of the game is fairly irrelevant. As an experienced gamer just the time spent being utterly bored by the game was bad enough, but if you want to pick it up for someone new to the platforming genre, what the devs ask would be perfect.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970846620', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1473042665}
review: Unique story and twist to mechanics on a throwback platformer.  Clean and simple graphics with nice lighting also make the game far more enjoyable to play than terrible "retro" 8-bit games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003545953', 'num_games_owned': 3094, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1466041148}
review: I'm currently 10 levels in and the game is solid.  It's undeniably indie, but I'm into that.  You're a candle and your primary ability is to double jump.  Lightning clouds are putting out your candle buddies and you have to reignite them.  I don't know what the deal is with the lightning clouds yet.  You have to collect wax to stay alive, but if you die you get full wax and there isn't much consequence except for not getting full stars on the level rating.  The pace and gameplay variation is a little slow, but the style is great and there are no major issues to speak of.  If the rest of the levels are similar, I'd give Candlelight a high rating of 7/10.  If the next levels evolve nicely, that could get up to 8/10, if that means anything...  It means it's a solid game.  Review full circle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026069722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1479924429}
review:
I have been following this game for a long time and it has come on a lot since it was first started so this was an instant buy for me.

However after playing a few levels I found myself getting a little bored as there wasn't enough variantion in the game for me so i found myself playing a level at a time and then coming back to it later to complete the game.

It's sound and visuals are nice enough but even they get a little bit tired after 6 levels I know it's supposed to be a dark game but there could of been more ineresting things that could of been done with each passing level.

That said this is an indie game and I try to support indie devs whenever I can so give it a go and you might just like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040147869', 'num_games_owned': 1017, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1458214945}

author: {'steamid': '76561198105651822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1458145513}
review:
Szerintem egy jó játék. Szép a grafika. A megoldandó kis feladatok jók. A karakter mozgása tökéletes. És a hangulattal is elégedett voltam. Talán az ár lehetne picit alacsonyabb.  De az is lehet ha több időt töltök el a játékban akkor ez a véleményem is megváltozik. Remélem a pályák nem fulladnak ki a monotonitásban. 

Összességében a játék remek, csak ajánlani tudom.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163652035', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1528488980}
review:
Very good game! Just played it and enjoyed 100% of the experience. Good mechanics, great artstyle and nice sound effect. Very lightweight and great game to play, with very well thought out levels. Who said you need to be AAA gamedev studio to develop great game. More games like this one please.

[b]Highly recommended[/b]
10/10
